alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:14PM CST until January 30 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snowfall accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible over multiple waves. * WHERE...East Central Wyoming into the northern Nebraska Panhandle including Converse and Niobrara Counties in Wyoming, and Sioux, Dawes, and Box Butte Counties in Nebraska. This includes the cities of Douglas, Lusk, Harrison, Chadron, Alliance. The highest totals will be found along the Pine Ridge. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. A lull in snowfall is expected overnight tonight, with snow increasing again on Sunday afternoon and continuing through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
